name: North Side Dash
description:
This is a 2D Dash style Platformer based on the North Side of Dublin and inspired by local events with a sense of humor, North Side Dash comes to you on the Android market. Developed by a pair of student Game Developers, Luke and Amaya. 

Take on the role of Skawwldy, a typical North Sider stereotype as he tries to get away with some poor old ladies dog. But hes not running from the police. Outrun this track runner grandma and successfully buy those precious cans of the pure Skawwldy wants over everything else. 

Not a finished game it is still a little buggy and missing some levels however if there is enough support we will most certainly come back and satisfy your thirst for North Side Dash! 

Thank you for visiting our page and we hope you enjoy the game!
